Hi there,

I'm interested in contributing some time to this project. What would be 
a good thing to do?

I thought about starting by writing some junit tests, and additional 
javadoc for some low-level utility code, such as the org.archive.util 
and org.archive.crawler.util packages.  This would let me get to know 
the code a bit better. Would this be a good/useful thing to do.

For you information, I'm a java developer with a lot of experience of 
build systems, and testing frameworks.  (and I worked on some web 
crawler stuff a long time ago (it was in Perl in 1994 !) and have had 
interests in the area ever since.)

Cheers,

james.
-- 
James Casey
http://jamesc.net/
